00052 int tonatiuh_script::init( QScriptEngine* engine )
00053 {
00054         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00055         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00056         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00057 
00058         rayTracer->Clear();
00059 
00060         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_exportAll = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_exportAll );
00061         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_exportAll", fun_tonatiuh_exportAll );
00062 
00063         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_export = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_export );
00064         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_export", fun_tonatiuh_export );
00065 
00066         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_filename = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_filename );
00067         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_filename", fun_tonatiuh_filename );
00068 
00069         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_irradiance = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_irradiance );
00070         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_irradiance", fun_tonatiuh_irradiance );
00071 
00072         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_numrays = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_numrays );
00073         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_numrays", fun_tonatiuh_numrays );
00074 
00075         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_photon_map = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_photon_map );
00076         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_photon_map", fun_tonatiuh_photon_map );
00077 
00078         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_random_generator = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_random_generator );
00079         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_random_generator", fun_tonatiuh_random_generator );
00080 
00081         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_sunposition = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_sunposition );
00082         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_sunposition", fun_tonatiuh_sunposition );
00083 
00084         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene );
00085         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene", fun_tonatiuh_setsunpositiontoscene );
00086 
00087         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers );
00088         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers", fun_tonatiuh_setdisconnectalltrackers );
00089 
00090         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_saveas = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_saveas );
00091         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_saveas", fun_tonatiuh_saveas );
00092 
00093         QScriptValue fun_tonatiuh_trace = engine->newFunction( tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_trace );
00094         engine->globalObject().setProperty("tonatiuh_trace", fun_tonatiuh_trace );
00095 
00096         return 1;
00097 }

00099 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_exportAll(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00100 {
00101         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: takes exactly one argument." );
00102         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: argument is not a string." );
00103 
00104         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00105         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00106 
00107         QString fileName = context->argument(0).toString();
00108         if( fileName.isEmpty()  )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_exportAll: the export fileName is empty." );
00109 
00110         QFileInfo file(  fileName );
00111         if( !file.isAbsolute() )
00112         {
00113                 QString dirName = rayTracer->GetDir();
00114                 QDir currentDir( dirName );
00115                 QFileInfo absolutefile( currentDir, fileName );
00116                 fileName = absolutefile.absoluteFilePath();
00117         }
00118 
00119         QFileInfo modelFile( fileName ) ;
00120         if( !( modelFile.absoluteDir().exists() ) )
00121         {
00122                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_exportAll: The %1 file can not be opened." ).arg( fileName );
00123                 return context->throwError( QScriptContext::UnknownError, message );
00124         }
00125 
00126         int result = rayTracer->SetExportAll( fileName );
00127         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_exportAll: Error." );
00128 
00129         return 1;
00130 }

00132 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_export(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00133 {
00134         if( context->argumentCount() < 2 )      return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: takes at least two argument." );
00135         if( context->argumentCount() > 3 )      return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: takes at most three argument." );
00136 
00137         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: argument 1 is not a string." );
00138         if( !context->argument( 1 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: argument 2 is not a string." );
00139         if( (context->argumentCount() == 3) && !context->argument( 2 ).isBool() )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export() argument 3 is not a boolean." );
00140 
00141         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00142         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00143 
00144         QString fileName = context->argument(0).toString();
00145         if( fileName.isEmpty()  )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: the export fileName is empty." );
00146 
00147         QFileInfo file(  fileName );
00148         if( !file.isAbsolute() )
00149         {
00150                 QString dirName = rayTracer->GetDir();
00151                 QDir currentDir( dirName );
00152                 QFileInfo absolutefile( currentDir, fileName );
00153                 fileName = absolutefile.absoluteFilePath();
00154         }
00155 
00156         QFileInfo modelFile( fileName ) ;
00157         if( !( modelFile.absoluteDir().exists() ) )
00158         {
00159                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_export: The %1 file can not be opened." ).arg( fileName );
00160                 return context->throwError( QScriptContext::UnknownError, message );
00161         }
00162 
00163         QString surfaceName = context->argument(1).toString();
00164         QStringList nodeNames =  surfaceName.split( "/",QString::SkipEmptyParts );
00165 
00166         if( nodeNames[0] != "SunNode" )
00167         {
00168                         surfaceName = QString( "//SunNode/" );
00169                         surfaceName.append( nodeNames.join( QString( "/" ) ) );
00170         };
00171 
00172         bool isValidSurface = rayTracer->IsValidSurface( surfaceName );
00173         if( !isValidSurface )
00174         {
00175                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_export: %1 is not a valid surface to export." ).arg( surfaceName );
00176                 context->throwError( message );
00177         }
00178 
00179         bool coordinates = true;
00180         if( context->argumentCount() == 3)      coordinates= context->argument(2).toBool();
00181 
00182         int result = rayTracer->SetExportSurface( fileName, surfaceName, coordinates );
00183         if( result == 0 ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_export: Error." );
00184         return 1;
00185 }

00187 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_filename(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00188 {
00189         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00190         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00191 
00192         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: takes exactly one argument." );
00193         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: argument is not a string.");
00194 
00195 
00196 
00197         QString fileName = context->argument(0).toString();
00198         if( fileName.isEmpty()  )       return  context->throwError( "tonatiuh_filename: the model file is not correct." );
00199 
00200         QFileInfo file(  fileName );
00201         if( !file.isAbsolute() )
00202         {
00203                 QString dirName = rayTracer->GetDir();
00204                 QDir currentDir( dirName );
00205                 QFileInfo absolutefile( currentDir, fileName );
00206                 fileName = absolutefile.absoluteFilePath();
00207 
00208         }
00209 
00210         QFileInfo modelFile( fileName ) ;
00211         if( !modelFile.exists() )
00212         {
00213                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_filename: The %1 file can not be opened." ).arg( fileName );
00214                 return context->throwError( QScriptContext::UnknownError, message );
00215         }
00216 
00217         int result = rayTracer->SetTonatiuhModelFile( fileName );
00218         if( result == 0 )
00219         {
00220                 QString message = QString( "tonatiuh_filename: The %1 file is not a valid file." ).arg( fileName );
00221                 return context->throwError( message );
00222         }
00223 
00224         return 1;
00225 }

00231 
00232 
00233         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_irradiance: takes exactly one argument." );
00234         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_irradiance: argument is not a number." );
00235 
00236         double irradiance = context->argument(0).toNumber();
00237 
00238         int result = rayTracer->SetIrradiance( irradiance );
00239         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( QScriptContext::UnknownError, "tonatiuh_irradiance: UnknownError." );
00240 
00241         return 1;

00244 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_numrays(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00245 {
00246         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00247         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00248 
00249         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numrays: takes exactly one argument." );
00250         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numrays: argument is not a number." );
00251 
00252         double nrays = context->argument(0).toNumber();
00253         if( nrays < 1 ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numrays: the number of rays must be at least 1." );
00254 
00255         int result = rayTracer->SetNumberOfRays( nrays );
00256         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_numrays: UnknownError." );
00257 
00258         return 1;
00259 }

00261 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_photon_map(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00262 {
00263         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00264         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00265 
00266         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_photon_map: takes exactly one argument." );
00267         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_photon_map: argument is not a string." );
00268 
00269         QString photonMapType = context->argument(0).toString();
00270         if( !rayTracer->IsValidPhotonMapType( photonMapType ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_photon_map: defined photonMap type is not valid." );
00271 
00272         int result =    rayTracer->SetPhotonMapType( photonMapType );
00273         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_photon_map: UnknownError." );
00274 
00275         return 1;
00276 }

00278 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_random_generator(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00279 {
00280 
00281         if( context->argumentCount() != 1 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_random_generator: takes exactly one argument." );
00282         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_random_generator: argument is not a string." );
00283 
00284         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property( "rayTracer" );
00285         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00286         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00287 
00288         QString randomDeviateType = context->argument(0).toString();
00289         if( !rayTracer->IsValidRandomGeneratorType( randomDeviateType ) )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_random_generator: defined random generator type is not valid." );
00290         rayTracer->SetRandomDeviateType( randomDeviateType );
00291 
00292         int result =    rayTracer->SetRandomDeviateType( randomDeviateType );
00293         if( result == 0 )       return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_random_generator: UnknownError." );
00294 
00295         return 1;
00296 }

00298 QScriptValue  tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_sunposition(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00299 {
00300         //tonatiuh_sunposition( azimuth, elevation, distance );
00301         if( context->argumentCount() != 3 )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: takes exactly 3 argument." );
00302         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: argument 1 is not a number." );
00303         if( !context->argument( 1 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: argument 2 is not a number." );
00304         if( !context->argument( 2 ).isNumber() )        return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: argument 3 is not a number." );
00305 
00306         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00307         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00308         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00309 
00310         double azimuth = context->argument(0).toNumber();
00311         if( ( azimuth < 0. ) || ( azimuth > 360. ) )    return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: azimuth value must be between 0 and 360 degrees." );
00312         rayTracer->SetSunAzimtuh( azimuth );
00313 
00314         double elevation = context->argument(1).toNumber();
00315         if( ( elevation < 0. ) || ( elevation > 90. ) ) return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: elevation value must be between 0 and 90 degrees." );
00316         rayTracer->SetSunElevation( elevation );
00317 
00318         double distance = context->argument(2).toNumber();
00319         if( distance < 0. )     return context->throwError( "tonatiuh_sunposition: distance must be greater than 0." );
00320         rayTracer->SetSunDistance( distance );
00321 
00322         return 1;
00323 
00324 }

00354 QScriptValue tonatiuh_script::tonatiuh_saveas(QScriptContext* context, QScriptEngine* engine )
00355 {
00356         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = engine->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00357         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00358         if( !rayTracer ) return 0;
00359 
00360         if( context->argumentCount()!=1 )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_saveas() takes exactly one argument." );
00361         if( !context->argument( 0 ).isString() )        context->throwError( "tonatiuh_saveas: argument is not a string.");
00362 
00363         QString fileName = context->argument(0).toString();
00364         if( fileName.isEmpty()  )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_saveas: the model file is not correct." );
00365 
00366         QFileInfo file(  fileName );
00367         if( !file.isAbsolute() )
00368         {
00369                 QString dirName = rayTracer->GetDir();
00370                 QDir currentDir( dirName );
00371                 QFileInfo absolutefile( currentDir, fileName );
00372                 fileName = absolutefile.absoluteFilePath();
00373         }
00374 
00375 
00376         int result = rayTracer->Save(fileName);
00377         if( result == 0 )       context->throwError( "tonatiuh_saveas() error." );
00378 
00379         return 1;
00380 }
